name: Daves Adventure
description:
There is a evil organization that has taken Dave's hoe HOSTAGE. Play as Dave in order to get it back, but there is a twist, YOU CANT PRESS A!

Will you be able to beat this monstrosity of a game?

THIS IS A ENTRY FOR THE MASH UP GAME JAM, UPDATE WILL COME OUT SOON.

Also kinda broken on level 4 so jump over the door into the area with the crates.
